Almighty Prod!.name: Almighty Prod!
Almighty Prod!.duration: Until start of player's next activation phase (unless used before that).
Almighty Prod!.effect: If the target unit fails its next Ordered Activation roll it may immediately re-roll the test (once). The spell’s effect ends immediately whether successful or not.

Banish Fear!.name: Banish Fear!
Banish Fear!.duration: Until the start of the player's next activation phase.
Banish Fear!.effect: The target unit may re-roll all failed Courage tests (once per test).

Heal Thee!.name: Heal Thee!
Heal Thee!.effect: Restore 1 Strength Point to a friendly unit within range. Strength may not rise above unit's original value.

Befuddle Thee!.name: Befuddle Thee!
Befuddle Thee!.effect: Automatically Batters an Unbattered unit within range.

Bog Thee!.name: Bog Thee!
Bog Thee!.duration: Until the end of the target's next activation phase.
Bog Thee!.effect: A quagmire springs up around the target unit; any movement or combat it is involved in counts as in rough terrain. Movement of other units is not affected. There is no effect if the target unit is in or moves into 'real' rough terrain.

Dragon's Breath!.name: Dragon's Breath!
Dragon's Breath!.duration: Until the end of the target's next activation phase.
Dragon's Breath!.effect: A magical wall of mist or fog is thrown up around the target unit; it may not Shoot or be Shot at, but may still be targeted by spells and moves as normal (the Dragon's Breath moves with it).

Power Bolt!.name: Power Bolt!
Power Bolt!.effect: A magical attack of flame, electric, poison, or whatever else suits your Spellcaster. This works exactly as a Shoot action, with a Shoot Value of 4+ (suffering –1 to dice rolls for targets over 12" away).

Sharper Blades!.name: Sharper Blades!
Sharper Blades!.duration: Until the start of the player's next activation phase.
Sharper Blades!.effect: The target unit may re-roll all failed Attack or Defence dice (once per Attack).

Stronger Shields!.name: Stronger Shields!
Stronger Shields!.duration: Until the start of the player's next activation phase.
Stronger Shields!.effect: The target unit's Armour increases by 1.

Sod-off Spell!.name: Sod-off Spell!
Sod-off Spell!.effect: This spell cancels out the effect of any spells currently affecting one unit with a duration of 'Until the start of the player's next activation phase' or 'Until the unit Rallies'. If successful, the effect of all applicable spells on the targeted units are ended immediately. The spellcaster cannot target itself.
